___flashScreen.description: Flash the screen when an alert sound occurs

___PayloadIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the payload, dot-delimited.  Usually root PayloadIdentifier+subidentifier

___PayloadVersion.description: The version of the whole configuration profile.

___PayloadType.description: The type of the payload, a reverse dns string

___PayloadOrganization.description: This value describes the issuing organization of the profile, as displayed to the user

___voiceOverOnOffKey.description:
VoiceOver provides spoken and brailled descriptions of items on the computer screen and provides
                control of the computer through the user of the keyboard.

___mouseDriver.description: Mouse Keys allows the mouse pointer to be controlled using the keyboard number pad.

___mouseDriverCursorSize.description: Mouse Cursor Size. 1 is normal, 4 is maximum.

___stickyKey.description: Sticky keys allows modifier keys to be set without having to hold the key down.

___slowKey.description: Slow keys adjusts the amount of time between when a key is pressed and when it is activated
